Off to math class. Cya all later, and have fun RPGing.


::Wolf::

The wolf picks up its pace as he hears Lunarpine's snarl, knowing that 
he'd be starving untill he found a more likely prey.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine smelled the dripping blood and knew that he had to get Ice 
> back to base quickly. He caught another scent on the wind, another 
> wolf. He knew how to handle this though. He snarled loudly as a sign 
> to the scavenger that this was his prize. He knew from pack 
instincts 
> that the other wolf would recognize Lunarpines size strength, and 
> health as a sign of dominance. Ice wasn't on the menu tonight.
> 
> 
> The clean up drones continued to take care of the virus infected 
> blood. Lunarpine watched as they dusted through his footprints 
> cleaning up all traces of blood. "I don't know if you know this or 
> not but you just came close to ending us all." He knew he was 
immune, 
> he also knew that if the virus would've gotten out that every 
faction 
> on this tiny little world would hunt them down and force them to 
> share the same f
